## OMRON Robotics Solutions
# Shaping the next era of manufacturing

Transform your production operations with OMRON Robotics.

[See the difference](https://robotics.omron.com/case-studies/)

### WHY OMRON ROBOTICS  OMRON Robotics solves critical manufacturing challenges with innovative and reliable robots and software—delivering scalable solutions to improve safety, productivity, and efficiency.

Robots deployed globally—enabling smarter, faster, and safer manufacturing.

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

[Learn more](https://robotics.omron.com/about-us/)

## Careers at OMRON
# OMRON Careers

Explore careers at OMRON Robotics and join a dynamic, international team driving innovation in industrial manufacturing with cutting-edge technology.

See job openings

[See job openings](https://cta-na2.hubspot.com/web-interactives/public/v1/track/click?encryptedPayload=AVxigLJciU4Cfz4mVG5etMkwftPYQOtbGurUQvg3AQdkqglvoZJdOv%2FykshfWoo%2Fie1LnGITTrmnfR2qbevA30kq5seo7Zb4zL8fpBHyJIun8k0m7NnUdNYvyeASr8Mdwnp6hszLrmPCTyDOxphWVkHYBP8cAe350lwdr%2B%2F6dGXbwWnd%2FJAoFhxcE4dhJKIRuFyN8DvP%2FCrQngssPUPbCp%2BkyhONlNG%2F3YJoB4Viu2Wr4hr7Cr3CGNU7JndIv1PeC10%2Bs9p9CxuqRL%2BZhRkLHm40iYycoYCt6Zjpov0hvGxZTkTiowrPMQ8wJ983qYNIlubkBTEh5c31kvmoFVH%2BnlDqMlhv9Vkn0%2B%2B5t4rq5QrkiwD4jERxNJL97ok1cr%2FgyIYkAqlPV57gtgAFgW8R%2FNMwne%2FPUQ2aPr8K0sIiZ8os%2FQ1shQF1ScUEK5fISGk%3D&portalId=47882041&webInteractiveContentId=216107221741&webInteractiveId=453416873698&containerType=EMBEDDED&pageUrl=https%3A%2F%2Frobotics.omron.com%2Fcareers-omron-robotics%2F&pageTitle=Careers+at+OMRON+Robotics&referrer=&userAgent=Mozilla%2F5.0+%28Windows+NT+10.0%3B+Win64%3B+x64%29+AppleWebKit%2F537.36+%28KHTML%2C+like+Gecko%29+Chrome%2F138.0.0.0+Safari%2F537.36&hutk=&hssc=&hstc=)

### WORKING AT OMRON  Join a team creating social value and shaping the future of robotics

At OMRON Robotics, you’ll become part of a global team committed to solving real-world manufacturing challenges through technology-driven innovation. Collaboration, inclusivity, and diversity form the foundation of our culture, empowering every team member to share new ideas, embrace opportunities, and grow their skills in a supportive environment. Whether you’re just starting your career or bringing years of experience, you’ll have the chance to make a meaningful impact—and help build a better society for all.

### WHAT SETS OMRON APART  Empowering innovators, advancing society

Your contributions matter here—experience a culture that encourages lifelong learning, authentic collaboration, and mentorship at every stage of your career. We’re committed to helping you reach your full potential, while making a real difference in society.

![background graphic](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/themes/omron/assets/img/svg/isolation.svg)

![Careers_Icon – Competitive rewards](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Careers_Icon-Competitive-rewards.svg?w=56)

##### Competitive rewards

We recognize and reward your expertise with fair, competitive compensation and benefits that reflect your role, performance, and contributions to our collective success.

![moving orb](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/themes/omron/assets/img/webp/orb-white.webp)

![Careers_Icon – Continuous learning](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Careers_Icon-Continuous-learning.svg?w=56)

##### Continuous learning

Expand your skills with ongoing training, development programs, and opportunities to advance at every stage of your career.

![moving orb](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/themes/omron/assets/img/webp/orb-white.webp)

![Careers_Icon – Diversity & inclusion](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Careers_Icon-Diversity-inclusion.svg?w=56)

##### Respect & belonging

Work alongside talented colleagues from around the world in an environment that values diverse perspectives, open communication, and mutual respect.

![moving orb](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/themes/omron/assets/img/webp/orb-white.webp)

![Careers_Icon – Empowering culture](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Careers_Icon-Empowering-culture.svg?w=56)

##### Empowering culture

Your ideas and feedback matter. We foster a supportive workplace where you can take initiative, make an impact, and grow.

![moving orb](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/themes/omron/assets/img/webp/orb-white.webp)

![Careers_Icon – Purpose-driven work](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Careers_Icon-Purpose-driven-work.svg?w=56)

##### Purpose-driven work

Make a difference by contributing to solutions that address real-world challenges and help build a safer, more sustainable society through innovative technology.

![moving orb](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/themes/omron/assets/img/webp/orb-white.webp)

![Careers_Icon – Global impact](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Careers_Icon-Global-impact.svg?w=56)

##### Global impact

Be part of a team driving change across industries worldwide—from manufacturing to social infrastructure—and help shape a brighter future for all.

![moving orb](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/themes/omron/assets/img/webp/orb-white.webp)

oads/2025/08/RB1200s-universal-end-effector-handling-boxes-for-automated-palletizing.jpg?w=1024https://robotics.omron.com/de/case-studies/palletizing-automation-fmcg-omron/2025-08-12T19:27:02+00:00https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/Operator-interacting-with-RC-1-cobot.jpghttps://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/RC-1-cobot-palletizer-operating-in-a-factory-setting.jpg?w=1024https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/Operator-interacting-with-RC-1-cobot.jpg?w=1024https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/RC-1-cobot-control-panel-interface.jpg?w=1024https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/Energy-efficient-RC-1-cobot-palletizer-in-action.jpg?w=1024https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/RC-1-robot-arm-stacking-boxes-on-a-pallet.jpg?w=1024https://robotics.omron.com/case-studies/machine-tending-automation-laser-marking-omron/2025-08-13T22:53:11+00:00https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/Cobot-performing-machine-tending-automation-at-laser-marking-station.jpghttps://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/Component-with-precise-laser-marking-after-automated-machine-tending.jpg?w=1024https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/Cobot-performing-machine-tending-automation-at-laser-marking-station.jpg?w=1024https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/Operator-overseeing-collaborative-robot-during-machine-tending-process.jpg?w=1024https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/Automated-production-line-with-machine-tending-cobots.jpg?w=1024https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/Collaborative-robot-automating-laser-marking-machine-tending.jpg?w=1024https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/Laser-marked-products-after-machine-tending-automation.jpg?w=1024https://robotics.omron.com/case-studies/production-automation-first-aid-kits-omron-cobot/2025-08-13T22:56:40+00:00https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/OMRO ## OL-450S Robotics Automation
[Back to blog](https://robotics.omron.com/blog/)

# Meet the OL-450S—Smarter Material Handling for Automated Warehousing

Blog

1/20/2025

![OL-450S Launch News by OMRON Robotics](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/OL-450S-Launch-News-by-OMRON-Robotics-scaled.jpg)

Share

![High Payload Capacity](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/High-Payload-Capacity.png?w=56)

MAX PAYLOAD

450 kg

![update](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/update.svg?w=56)

LIFT HEIGHT

108 – 308mm

![traffic](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/traffic.svg?w=56)

MAX SPEED

1200 mm/s

![reorder–reorder-arrow-move-arrange](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/reorder-reorder-arrow-move-arrange.svg?w=56)

RUN TIME

7 hours

## Optimizing material flow: Solving a key challenge in modern operations

If you’re managing a manufacturing plant, warehouse, or distribution center, you know that moving roll cages, carts, and trolleys isn’t just a minor task—it’s the backbone of your daily operations. Yet, manual material handling ties up staff, introduces safety risks, and creates bottlenecks that slow down your operations. With ongoing labor shortages and rising customer demands, companies need a smarter, scalable way to keep goods moving.

What if you could automate these repetitive movements, boost efficiency, and let your team focus on higher-value work—all without costly facility upgrades or complex engineering?

### Introducing the OL-450S: Omron’s First Omni-Lift AMR

Meet the [OL-450S](https://robotics.omron.com/products/mobile-robots/ol-series/ol-450s/) **,** a low profile, omni-directional Autonomous Mobile Robot (AMR) with an integrated lifting plate, built to streamline material handling in fast-paced industries such as automotive, electronics, food and household goods, and more. Unlike traditional solutions, the OL-450S is plug-and-play—no toppers, no customization, no lengthy integration, so you can start seeing ROI from day one. Key features at a glance:

- **Payload:** 450 kg
- **Lifting Plate Range:** 108 mm – 308 mm
- **Top Speed:** 1200 mm/s
- **Safety Coverage:** 360°

- **Runtime:** Up to 7 hours per charge
- **Recharge Time:** 45 minutes (wireless, inductive charging)
- **Fleet Management:** Centralized via Omron’s FLOW Core software

#### “Its low-profile design, combined with powerful navigation and fleet management capabilities, makes it an ideal solution for businesses looking to automate their material transport processes and improve safety and productivity,” – Justin King, Vice President, Product Management and Marketing at OMRON Robotics

![](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Reverse-Animation-2.png)

![](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Lifting-Cart-2.png)

### Designed for agile, modern production needs

Production floors today face rapid schedule changes, increased throughput demands, and tight space constraints. The OL-450S addresses these challenges with intuitive operation, seamless integration, and a compact footprint to keep your workflow smooth and efficient:

1. **Seamless integration:**

Works with your existing carts and trolleys—no need to replace equipment.
2. **Centralized fleet management:**

Operate your entire fleet through Omron’s FLOW Core software.
3. **Compact, agile design**

Navigates crowded aisles, tight corners, and cleanrooms with ease.
4. **Plug-and-play deployment:**

Ready to deploy out of the box—no custom engineering or lengthy setup required.
5. **Continuous operation:**

Runs up to 7 hours per charge and recharges wirelessly in just 45 minutes—no cables, no waiting—so your materials keep moving with minimal downtime.

Whether you’re weaving through busy workspaces, maneuvering around unexpected obstacles, or managing a diverse fleet, the OL-450S adapts to your needs for just-in-time material handling.

![OL-450S_Features](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/OL-450S_Features_Sharp.jpg)

### Real-world impact: Industry applications

#### **Manufacturing**

Automates heavy component transport between assembly stations, freeing skilled workers for higher-value tasks and reducing injury risk.

#### **Warehousing**

Moves carts and racks with precision, minimizing manual labor and handling errors—ideal for dynamic order fulfillment.

#### **Retail distribution**

Handles high-volume goods transport, boosting throughput and accuracy. Centralized fleet management coordinates up to 100 robots for peak efficiency—even during seasonal spikes.

### Why choose the OL-450S?

**Reduced downtime:** Continuous operations with minimal interruptions.

**Increased throughput:** Faster task completion, reduce cycle times, and higher output.

**Improved safety:** Advanced, dynamic safety features protect your team and equipment.

**Repeatability & consistency:** Reliable, repeatable results across shifts.

**Application versatility:** Efficiently services multiple production lines and load types.

![](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Integrated_Low_Profile_Plate-OL.jpg)

### Scale with confidence: Effortless fleet management

Every facility is unique. The OL-450S adapts instantly, handling a wide range of carts and roll cages right out of the box—no costly retrofits. Its intelligent software predicts and avoids obstacles, sharing safety data fleet-wide for coordinated protection.

As your automation needs evolve, Omron’s [FLOW Core software](https://robotics.omron.com/products/mobile-robots/software/) lets you coordinate up to 100 AMRs, including the OL-450S, and seamlessly integrate any combination of OMRON models, such as the [LD](https://robotics.omron.com/products/mobile-robots/ld-series/), [MD](https://robotics.omron.com/products/mobile-robots/md-series/), and [HD](https://robotics.omron.com/products/mobile-robots/hd-series/) series. This flexibility empowers you to build a tailored fleet that meets every material handling requirement, from light-duty deliveries to heavy-load transport. For even greater control and integration, the [Mobile I/O Box](https://robotics.omron.com/products/mobile-robots/mobile-i-o-box/) enables you to summon AMRs or connected devices directly from your facility systems, reducing bottlenecks, streamlining operations, and allowing you to scale up without added complexity.

![Multiple OL-450S AMRs Drive in Factory](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Multiple-OL-450S-1-2.png)

#### **Ready to experience smarter material handling?**

Operational excellence is your advantage. The OL-450S helps you achieve it—safely, efficiently, and responsively.

Have questions or want to see the OL-450S in action? Contact our team to learn more or book a live demo.

[Get started](https://robotics.omron.com/talk-to-an-expert/)

## New PoC Center
[Back to news](https://robotics.omron.com/news/)

# OMRON Opens New Proof of Concept Center in Sydney

News

6/2/2025

![27.05.25_0801_MP](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/27.05.25_0801_MP.jpg)

Share

## Driving innovation in advanced manufacturing

OMRON is proud to announce the opening of our state-of-the-art Proof of Concept (PoC) Center in Sydney, Australia, located at the Engineering Innovation Hub in Parramatta and co-located with [Western Sydney University](https://www.westernsydney.edu.au/). As the first OMRON PoC Center in Oceania, this facility enables manufacturers across Australia and New Zealand to innovate with confidence, support sovereign capabilities, and develop the next generation of STEM talent.

### Empowering industries, education, and innovation

The Automation and Robotics PoC Australia is more than a showcase of world-class technologies—it’s a hands-on, collaborative hub for manufacturers, students, and partners to:

- **Test and Validate Technologies:** Trial the latest [robotics](https://robotics.omron.com/products/), AI, machine vision, IoT, and safety solutions in a real-world environment before making investment decisions.
- **Access Expert Engineering Support:** Benefit from feasibility studies, PoC trials, and collaborative engineering projects tailored to your unique challenges.
- **Upskill Your Workforce:** Participate in hands-on technical training, workshops, and upskilling initiatives designed to build industry-ready talent.
- **Accelerate Innovation:** Engage in joint R&D, innovation support, and knowledge sharing through partnerships with OMRON and Western Sydney University.

#### “This center will accelerate onshoring our world-class expertise — strengthened by local commitment and trusted partner networks and will further empower businesses and people to operate more efficiently, innovate faster, and achieve new heights.” – Mr. Henry Zhou, Managing Director of OMRON Automation and Robotics Oceania.

1 / 15

### A hub for collaboration and growth

The Automation and Robotics PoC Australia is a catalyst for industry, government, and academia to work together, supporting Australia’s [Future Made in Australia Policy](https://treasury.gov.au/policy-topics/future-made-australia) and strengthening the strategic partnership between Australia and Japan. Our collaboration with Western Sydney University gives businesses direct access to job-ready STEM talent and real-world experience, ensuring immediate impact and long-term growth.

As part of OMRON’s global network of 45 Automation Centers and PoC Labs, the Sydney Center connects local customers with thousands of application engineers and global expertise. Whether you’re looking to accelerate your digital transformation, upskill your workforce, or co-create the next breakthrough in advanced manufacturing, OMRON is here to support your journey.

For more information or to book a visit, please visit [omron.com.au](https://www.omron.com.au/).

## OMRON and PTS Automation Partnership
[Back to news](https://robotics.omron.com/news/)

# OMRON Announces PTS AUTOMATION as Certified Systems Integrator Partner

News

5/11/2025

![OMRON PTS Automation Partnership Announcement](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/OMRON-PTS-Automation-Partnership-Announcement-e1753309721553.jpg)

Share

## PTS AUTOMATION just got awarded the merit of becoming an OMRON Robotic Certified Systems Integrator.

Pleasanton, CA, June 2025 – OMRON is pleased to announce the addition of PTS AUTOMATION as the newest member of our System Integrator program. Based in Columbus, Indiana, Precision Tools Service, Inc. has been a valued strategic partner of OMRON for many years. With their comprehensive in-house integration and service offerings, PTS Automation stands out as a complete solution provider. Over the past few years, they have consistently demonstrated exceptional expertise by successfully delivering numerous Autonomous Mobile Robot (AMR) projects to key customers.

### **About the OMRON Certified System Integrator program**

The [OMRON Certified Systems Integrator program](https://assets.omron.com/m/30d7a712222cdc72/original/certified-system-integrator-program-brochure.pdf) matches best-in-class solution providers with the technology, training, and resources required to deliver innovative and competitive solutions. With the rapid growth in automation technologies, manufacturers and business partners strive to deliver open and secure Industry 4.0 solutions that support [flexible manufacturing](https://automation.omron.com/en/us/solutions/flexible-manufacturing/) and deliver a competitive advantage. The combined strength of this relationship solves customer challenges today while enabling more efficient, fully integrated systems that will successfully meet future demands.

For OMRON, system integrators play a critical role in designing and delivering fully integrated automation solutions. They also possess industry and application expertise in implementing the latest technologies from OMRON and in providing turnkey system solutions.

### **About PTS AUTOMATION**

[PTS Automation](https://www.ptservice.com/) is the engineering and technical support, as well as system integration, arm of Precision Tools Service, Inc. PTS is committed to delivering automation and safety solutions that build trusted partnerships. They are dedicated to delivering high-performance automation solutions tailored to the needs of OEMs, Machine Builders, and End-User customers. Their team of Automation Specialists and Application Engineers work closely with customers to design and develop systems that meet the unique challenges of each application. From concept to execution, they focus on providing technically sound, scalable, and efficient solutions that enhance productivity and reliability.

[![](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/PTSLogowithBlackText.png)](https://www.ptservice.com/)

PTS’s capabilities span the full project lifecycle, supported by a skilled staff of Controls Engineers, Panel Builders, Installers, Project Managers, and Quality Control Team. Together, the team ensures that every solution they deliver meets rigid industry standards and is executed on schedule. Whether it’s a custom control panel, system retrofit, or full-scale system integration, PTS brings the experience, precision, and responsiveness needed to drive success.

PTS’s End-User solutions focus on integrating new technologies into existing manufacturing processes to enhance productivity, reduce defects, and eliminate waste. They specialize in identifying key areas for improvement and applying targeted automation strategies that deliver measurable results. When partnering with OEMs and Machine Builders, PTS acts as an extension of their team—enhancing their offerings with added value through advanced control systems, user-friendly interfaces, and robust integration capabilities.

### **About OMRON Automation and Robotics**

OMRON Automation and OMRON Robotics are global leaders in industrial automation and robotics, providing fully integrated solutions for manufacturers worldwide. OMRON Automation specializes in sensing, control, safety, vision, and motion technologies, while OMRON Robotics focuses exclusively on advanced robotics solutions. With a legacy of innovation since 1933 and a team of about 30,000 employees worldwide, OMRON empowers businesses in over 110 countries to solve complex manufacturing challenges and drive productivity. Learn more about OMRON’s automation solutions at [automation.omron.com](https://automation.omron.com/en/us/).

To discover OMRON’s full range of robotics technologies, visit our [overview page](https://robotics.omron.com/products/).

## OMRON and SEI Partnership
[Back to news](https://robotics.omron.com/news/)

# OMRON Announces SEI Automation as a Certified Robotic Systems Integrator Partner

News

5/18/2025

![SEI Automation and OMRON Robotics Partnership Announcement_Card](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/05/SEI-Automation-and-OMRON-Robotics-Partnership-Announcement_Card.jpg)

Share

## Strengthening Automation in Mexico: The SEI and OMRON Partnership

Pleasanton, CA, May 2025 – OMRON has welcomed SEI Automation as the newest partner in its Systems Integrator program. Headquartered in Tijuana, Mexico, SEI is a regional automation and technology company providing standard and custom automation solutions for various industrial application like: Robot Integration, Assembly Systems, Feeding Solutions, Packaging, Controls systems and more. This partnership allows OMRON to improve AMR & Fixed Robotic integration coverage in Mexico. SEI and OMRON have worked together for many years now delivering multiple successful industrial automation projects. The SEI team has been demonstrating competency using OMRON Scara Robot, Mobile Robots and the Automation portfolio of products like PLCs, HMIs, safety and servo controls for many years.

### **About the OMRON System Integrator program**

The OMRON Systems Integrator program matches best-in-class solution providers with the technology, training, and resources required to deliver innovative and competitive solutions. With the rapid growth in automation technologies, manufacturers and business partners strive to deliver open and secure robotics solutions that support flexible manufacturing and deliver a competitive advantage. The combined strength of this relationship solves customer challenges today while enabling more efficient, fully integrated systems that will successfully meet future demands.

For OMRON, system integrators play a critical role in designing and delivering fully integrated automation solutions. They also possess industry and application expertise in implementing the latest technologies from OMRON and in providing turnkey system solutions.

### **About SEI Automation**

[SEI Automation](https://sei-at.com/) is a company based in Tijuana, Mexico, specializing in automation solutions. They focus on providing advanced automation technologies and services to enhance manufacturing and industrial processes. SEI Automation is dedicated to delivering innovative and efficient solutions that help businesses optimize their operations and improve productivity.

[![](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/SEI-LOGOTIPO-fondo-transparente.png?w=1024)](https://sei-at.com/)

### **About OMRON Automation and Robotics**

OMRON Automation and OMRON Robotics are global leaders in industrial automation and robotics, providing fully integrated solutions for manufacturers worldwide. OMRON Automation specializes in sensing, control, safety, vision, and motion technologies, while OMRON Robotics focuses exclusively on advanced robotics solutions. With a legacy of innovation since 1933 and a team of about 30,000 employees worldwide, OMRON empowers businesses in over 110 countries to solve complex manufacturing challenges and drive productivity. Learn more about OMRON’s automation solutions at [automation.omron.com](https://automation.omron.com/en/us/).

To discover OMRON’s full range of robotics technologies, visit our [overview page](https://robotics.omron.com/products/).

[Back to news](https://robotics.omron.com/news/)

## OL-450S Autonomous Robot
[Back to news](https://robotics.omron.com/news/)

# OMRON Introduces the OL-450S – A Complete Autonomous Mobile Robot Solution for Material Handling

News

4/20/2025

![OL-450S Launch News by OMRON Robotics_2025](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/OL-450S-Launch-News-by-OMRON-Robotics_2025-e1750271276661.jpg)

Share

## Boost productivity, streamline operations, and enhance safety with Omron’s latest innovation, the OL-450S.

Pleasanton, California — April 20, 2025— OMRON Robotics and Safety Technologies has released the [OL-450S](https://robotics.omron.com/products/mobile-robots/ol-series/ol-450s/), a low-profile, omni-directional Autonomous Mobile Robot (AMR) designed to optimize workflows, maximize efficiency, and improve safety in material handling. Featuring an integrated lifting plate, advanced navigation, and centralized fleet management, the OL-450S offers a complete solution for automating material transport in [automotive](https://robotics.omron.com/industries/automotive/), [semiconductor and electronics](https://robotics.omron.com/industries/digital/), [food and household goods](https://robotics.omron.com/industries/food-commodities/), [medical](https://robotics.omron.com/industries/medical/), and [other fast-paced industries](https://robotics.omron.com/industries/unique-emerging/).

### Streamlined and safe material handling

The OL-450S efficiently handles the transport of load carriers with a payload capacity of up to 450 kg and a lifting range from 108 to 308 mm. Its integrated lifting plate reduces customization investments and time-consuming engineering. This allows businesses to improve operational efficiency without infrastructure changes. Safety is at the core of the OL-450S, featuring ISO 3691-4 compliance (except clause 4.12), dynamic braking, and intelligent obstacle avoidance.

### Advanced navigation and wireless charging

Equipped with 360° safety coverage and advanced omni-directional drive, the OL-450S navigates complex layouts with ease—enabling tight maneuvers, lateral movement, and in-place rotation to meet diverse navigation needs. Its software-based navigation logic and strategically positioned sensors enhance localization and support safe, autonomous operation in dynamic environments. With wireless charging, the OL-450S offers flexible deployment, simplified management, and uninterrupted workflows, maximizing uptime and productivity.

#### “Its low-profile design, combined with its powerful navigation and fleet management capabilities, makes it an ideal solution for businesses looking to automate their material transport processes and improve safety and productivity.”

Introducing the OL-450S - The Ultimate AMR for Material Handling \| OMRON Robotics from OMRON Robotics on Vimeo

![video thumbnail](https://i.vimeocdn.com/video/1998876922-8fee56c3e0bfc2c0c46fb8ead0ce09304441c3595e8913f03471d560bfe0decf-d?mw=80&q=85)

[Watch on Vimeo](https://vimeo.com/1070355962?fl=pl&fe=vl)

### Centralized fleet management for maximum efficiency

As with all OMRON AMRs, the OL-450S is managed by OMRON’s [FLOW Core software](https://robotics.omron.com/products/mobile-robots/software/), a centralized platform capable of managing fleets of up to 100 mobile robots with varying payload capacities. This enterprise-level system ensures seamless integration into existing infrastructure, enabling streamlined operations and optimal fleet performance.

“The OL-450S represents a significant advancement in autonomous material handling,” said Justin King, Vice President, Product Management and Marketing at OMRON Robotics and Safety Technologies. “Its low-profile design, combined with its powerful navigation and fleet management capabilities, makes it an ideal solution for businesses looking to automate their material transport processes and improve safety and productivity.”

Visit the [OL-450S](https://robotics.omron.com/products/mobile-robots/ol-series/ol-450s/) product page for detailed information or [contact our team](https://robotics.omron.com/book-a-consultation/) to discuss your specific application needs.

## OMRON PTS Automation Partnership
[Neuigkeiten Landingpage](https://robotics.omron.com/de/news/)

# OMRON gibt PTS AUTOMATION als zertifizierten Systemintegrator-Partner bekannt

Nachrichten

![OMRON PTS Automation Partnership Announcement](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/OMRON-PTS-Automation-Partnership-Announcement-e1753309721553.jpg)

Teilen

## PTS AUTOMATION ist jetzt offiziell OMRON-zertifizierter Systemintegrator für Robotik

Pleasanton, Kalifornien, Juni 2025 – OMRON freut sich, die Aufnahme von PTS AUTOMATION als neuestes Mitglied des Systemintegrator-Programms bekanntzugeben. Precision Tools Service, Inc. mit Sitz in Columbus, Indiana, ist seit vielen Jahren ein geschätzter strategischer Partner von OMRON. Mit ihren umfassenden Integrations- und Serviceleistungen hebt sich PTS Automation als Komplettanbieter hervor. In den vergangenen Jahren hat PTS kontinuierlich außergewöhnliches Know-how bewiesen und zahlreiche Projekte mit autonomen mobilen Robotern (AMR) erfolgreich für wichtige Kunden umgesetzt.

### **Über das OMRON Systemintegrator-Programm**

Das [OMRON Certified Systems Integrator Programm](https://assets.omron.com/m/30d7a712222cdc72/original/certified-system-integrator-program-brochure.pdf) bringt erstklassige Lösungsanbieter mit der Technologie, Schulung und den Ressourcen zusammen, die zur Bereitstellung innovativer und wettbewerbsfähiger Lösungen erforderlich sind. Angesichts des rasanten Wachstums der Automatisierungstechnologien setzen Hersteller und Geschäftspartner auf offene und sichere Industrie 4.0-Lösungen, die eine [flexible Fertigung](https://automation.omron.com/en/us/solutions/flexible-manufacturing/) ermöglichen und Wettbewerbsvorteile schaffen. Die gebündelte Stärke dieser Partnerschaft löst komplexe Kundenherausforderungen mit maßgeschneiderten, effizienten und vollintegrierten Lösungen, die sowohl aktuelle als auch zukünftige Anforderungen zuverlässig erfüllen.

Für OMRON nehmen Systemintegratoren eine zentrale Rolle bei der Entwicklung und Bereitstellung vollständig integrierter Automatisierungslösungen ein. Sie verfügen über Branchen- und Anwendungsexpertise in der Implementierung neuester OMRON-Technologien und bieten schlüsselfertige Systemlösungen.

### **Über PTS AUTOMATION**

[PTS Automation](https://www.ptservice.com/) ist der Bereich für Engineering, technischen Support und Systemintegration von Precision Tools Service, Inc. PTS setzt sich dafür ein, Automatisierungs- und Sicherheitslösungen zu liefern, die vertrauensvolle Partnerschaften schaffen. Sie bieten leistungsstarke Automatisierungslösungen, die speziell auf die Anforderungen von OEMs, Maschinenbauern und Endanwendern zugeschnitten sind. Das Team aus Automatisierungsspezialisten und Applikationsingenieuren arbeitet eng mit Kunden zusammen, um Systeme zu entwickeln, die den individuellen Herausforderungen jeder Anwendung entsprechen. Von der Konzeption bis zur Umsetzung liegt der Fokus auf technisch fundierten, skalierbaren und effizienten Lösungen, die Produktivität und Zuverlässigkeit steigern.

[![](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/PTSLogowithBlackText.png)](https://www.ptservice.com/)

Die Kompetenzen von PTS umfassen den gesamten Projektlebenszyklus und werden von einem erfahrenen Team aus Steuerungstechnikern, Schaltschrankbauern, Installateuren, Projektmanagern und Qualitätssicherungsfachleuten getragen. Gemeinsam stellt das Team sicher, dass jede Lösung strenge Industriestandards erfüllt und termingerecht umgesetzt wird. Ob individuelle Bedienfelder, Systemnachrüstungen oder vollständige Systemintegrationen – PTS bringt die nötige Erfahrung, Präzision und Reaktionsfähigkeit für den Projekterfolg mit.

Die Endanwenderlösungen von PTS konzentrieren sich auf die Integration neuer Technologien in bestehende Produktionsprozesse, um Produktivität zu erhöhen, Fehler zu reduzieren und Ausschuss zu minimieren. Sie sind darauf spezialisiert, Schlüsselbereiche für Verbesserungen zu identifizieren und gezielte Automatisierungsstrategien umzusetzen, die messbare Ergebnisse liefern. In der Zusammenarbeit mit OEMs und Maschinenbauern agiert PTS als Erweiterung des jeweiligen Teams und ergänzt deren Angebote durch fortschrittliche Steuerungssysteme, benutzerfreundliche Schnittstellen und robuste Integrationskompetenz.

### **Über OMRON Automation und Robotics**

OMRON Automation und OMRON Robotics sind weltweit führend in industrieller Automatisierung und Robotik und bieten vollständig integrierte Lösungen für Hersteller weltweit. OMRON Automation spezialisiert sich auf Sensorik-, Steuerungs-, Sicherheits-, Bildverarbeitungs- und Bewegungstechnologien, während OMRON Robotics sich ausschließlich auf fortschrittliche Robotiklösungen konzentriert. Mit einer Innovationsgeschichte seit 1933 und rund 30.000 Mitarbeitern weltweit unterstützt OMRON Unternehmen in über 110 Ländern dabei, komplexe Fertigungsherausforderungen zu lösen und die Produktivität zu steigern. Erfahren Sie mehr über die Automatisierungslösungen von OMRON unter [automation.omron.com](https://automation.omron.com/en/us/).

Um die gesamte Palette der Robotik-Technologien von OMRON zu entdecken, besuchen Sie unsere [Übersichtsseite](https://robotics.omron.com/de/products/).

[Neuigkeiten Landingpage](https://robotics.omron.com/de/news/)

## New Robotics Center
[Neuigkeiten Landingpage](https://robotics.omron.com/de/news/)

# OMRON eröffnet neues Automatisierungs- und Robotik-PoC-Center in Sydney

Nachrichten

![27.05.25_0801_MP](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/27.05.25_0801_MP.jpg)

Teilen

## Innovationsschub für die Fertigung der Zukunft

OMRON ist stolz, die Eröffnung seines hochmodernen Proof of Concept (PoC) Centers in Sydney, Australien, bekannt zu geben. Das neue Zentrum befindet sich im ‚Engineering Innovation Hub‘ in Parramatta und ist direkt mit der [Western Sydney University](https://www.westernsydney.edu.au/) verbunden. Als erstes OMRON PoC Center in Ozeanien bietet diese Einrichtung Herstellern aus Australien und Neuseeland die Möglichkeit, innovative Lösungen zu testen, lokale Kompetenzen zu stärken und die nächste Generation von MINT-Fachkräften zu fördern.

### Industrien, Bildung und Innovation stärken

Das Automation Robotics PoC Australia ist weit mehr als eine Präsentationsfläche für Spitzentechnologien. Es ist ein praxisorientierter Treffpunkt für Hersteller, Studierende und Partner, um gemeinsam zu:

- **Technologien testen und validieren:** Testen Sie neuesten [Roboter](https://robotics.omron.com/de/products/)-, KI-, Bildverarbeitungs-, IoT- und Sicherheitslösungen unter realen Bedingungen – noch vor einer Investitionsentscheidung.
- **Zugang zu fachkundiger technischer Unterstützung:** Profitieren Sie von Machbarkeitsstudien, PoC-Tests und gemeinsamen Engineering-Projekten, die individuell auf Ihre Herausforderungen zugeschnitten sind.
- **Mitarbeiter weiterbilden:** Nehmen Sie an praxisnahen Trainings, Workshops und Weiterbildungsinitiativen teil, um Ihr Team optimal auf die Anforderungen der Industrie vorzubereiten.
- **Innovation beschleunigen:** Engagieren Sie sich in gemeinsamen Forschungs- und Entwicklungsprojekten, profitieren Sie von Innovationsförderung und Wissensaustausch durch die Partnerschaft mit OMRON und der Western Sydney University.

#### „Dieses Zentrum wird die lokale Expertise stärken, Innovationen beschleunigen und Unternehmen sowie Menschen befähigen, effizienter zu arbeiten und neue Maßstäbe zu setzen.“ – Henry Zhou, Geschäftsführer OMRON Automation and Robotics Oceania.

- ![Große Eröffnung des PoC in Sydney](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Sdyney-PoC-Grand-Opening-1-rev-2048x1366-1.png?w=1024)

1 / 15

### Ein Zentrum für Zusammenarbeit und Wachstum

Das Automatisierungs- und Robotik-PoC ist ein Impulsgeber für die Zusammenarbeit von Industrie, Regierung und Wissenschaft. Es unterstützt die [„Future Made in Australia Policy“](https://treasury.gov.au/policy-topics/future-made-australia) und festigt die strategische Partnerschaft zwischen Australien und Japan. Die Kooperation mit der Western Sydney University ermöglicht Unternehmen direkten Zugang zu praxisnah ausgebildeten MINT-Talenten und garantiert sowohl unmittelbare als auch nachhaltige Erfolge.

Als Teil des globalen OMRON Netzwerks mit 45 Automation Centers und PoC Labs verbindet das Sydney Center lokale Kunden mit Tausenden Anwendungsexperten und internationaler Kompetenz. Ob Sie Ihre digitale Transformation vorantreiben, Ihr Team weiterqualifizieren oder gemeinsam mit OMRON den nächsten Durchbruch in der Fertigung erzielen möchten – wir begleiten Sie auf Ihrem Weg in die Zukunft.

Für weitere Informationen oder um einen Besuch zu buchen, besuchen Sie bitte [omron.com.au](https://www.omron.com.au/).

[Neuigkeiten Landingpage](https://robotics.omron.com/de/news/)

## OL-450S Launch
[Neuigkeiten Landingpage](https://robotics.omron.com/de/news/)

# OMRON stellt den OL-450S vor – eine komplette autonome Roboterlösung für den Materialtransport

Nachrichten

20/4/2025

![OL-450S Launch News by OMRON Robotics_2025](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/OL-450S-Launch-News-by-OMRON-Robotics_2025-e1750271276661.jpg)

Teilen

## Steigern Sie Ihre Produktivität, optimieren Sie Abläufe und erhöhen Sie die Sicherheit mit Omron’s neuester Innovation, dem OL-450S.

Pleasanton, Kalifornien — 20. April 2025– OMRON Robotics and Safety Technologies hat den [OL-450S](https://robotics.omron.com/de/products/mobile-robots/ol-series/ol-450s/) auf den Markt gebracht, einen flachen, omnidirektionalen autonomen mobilen Roboter (AMR) der entwickelt wurde, um Arbeitsprozesse zu optimieren, Effizienz zu steigern und die Sicherheit beim Materialtransport zu erhöhen. Mit integrierter Hebeplatte, fortschrittlicher Navigation und zentralem Flottenmanagement bietet der OL-450S eine umfassende Lösung für die Automatisierung des Materialtransports in der [Automobil-](https://robotics.omron.com/de/industries/automotive/), [Halbleiter- und Elektronik-](https://robotics.omron.com/de/industries/digital/), [Lebensmittel- und Haushaltswaren-](https://robotics.omron.com/de/industries/food-commodities/), [Medizin-](https://robotics.omron.com/de/industries/medizinische/) und [anderen dynamischen Branchen](https://robotics.omron.com/de/industries/unique-emerging/).

### Effizienter und sicherer Materialtransport

Der OL-450S transportiert Ladungsträger zuverlässig mit einer Nutzlast von bis zu 450 kg und einem Hubbereich von 108 bis 308 mm. Die integrierte Hebeplatte spart Kosten für individuelle Anpassungen und aufwändige Konstruktionen. So können Unternehmen ihre Effizienz steigern, ohne die Infrastruktur verändern zu müssen. Sicherheit steht beim OL-450S an erster Stelle: Er erfüllt die ISO 3691-4-Norm (außer Klausel 4.12), verfügt über dynamische Bremsen und intelligente Hindernisvermeidung.

### Fortschrittliche Navigation und kabelloses Laden

Mit 360°-Sicherheitsabdeckung und modernem omnidirektionalem Antrieb bewegt sich der OL-450S mühelos durch komplexe Umgebungen. Enge Manöver, seitliche Bewegungen und Drehungen auf der Stelle sind problemlos möglich – für maximale Flexibilität bei der Navigation. Die softwarebasierte Steuerung und strategisch platzierte Sensoren sorgen für präzise Lokalisierung und einen sicheren, autonomen Betrieb in dynamischen Arbeitsbereichen. Dank kabellosem Laden bleibt der Workflow unterbrechungsfrei, das Management wird vereinfacht und die Produktivität steigt.

#### „Sein flaches Design und die leistungsstarken Navigations- und Flottenmanagementfunktionen machen den OL-450S zur idealen Lösung für Unternehmen, die ihre Materialtransportprozesse automatisieren und gleichzeitig Sicherheit und Produktivität erhöhen möchten.“

Introducing the OL-450S - The Ultimate AMR for Material Handling \| OMRON Robotics on Vimeo

### Zentralisiertes Flottenmanagement für maximale Effizienz

Wie alle OMRON AMRs wird auch der OL-450S über die [FLOW Core Software](https://robotics.omron.com/de/products/mobile-robots/software/) gesteuert – eine zentrale Plattform, die Flotten von bis zu 100 mobilen Robotern mit unterschiedlichen Nutzlasten verwalten kann. Dieses unternehmensweite System ermöglicht eine nahtlose Integration in bestehende Strukturen und sorgt für reibungslose Abläufe und optimale Flottenleistung.

„Der OL-450S stellt einen bedeutenden Fortschritt im autonomen Materialtransport dar“, sagte Justin King, Vice President, Produktmanagement und Marketing bei OMRON Robotics and Safety Technologies. „Sein flaches Design, kombiniert mit seinen leistungsstarken Navigations- und Flottenmanagementfunktionen, macht ihn zu einer idealen Lösung für Unternehmen, die ihre Materialtransportprozesse automatisieren und die Sicherheit und Produktivität verbessern möchten.“

Besuchen Sie die Produktseite des [OL-450S](https://robotics.omron.com/de/products/mobile-robots/ol-series/ol-450s/) für weitere Informationen oder [kontaktieren Sie unser Team](https://robotics.omron.com/de/book-a-consultation/), um Ihre individuellen Anforderungen zu besprechen.

## OMRON and SEI Partnership
[Neuigkeiten Landingpage](https://robotics.omron.com/de/news/)

# OMRON ernennt SEI Automation zum zertifizierten Partner für die Integration von Robotersystemen

Nachrichten

![SEI Automation and OMRON Robotics Partnership Announcement_Card](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/05/SEI-Automation-and-OMRON-Robotics-Partnership-Announcement_Card.jpg)

Teilen

## Automatisierung in Mexiko: Partnerschaft zwischen SEI und OMRON

Pleasanton, CA, Mai 2025 – OMRON begrüßt SEI Automation als neuen Partner im Systemintegrator-Programm. Das Unternehmen mit Hauptsitz in Tijuana, Mexiko, bietet sowohl Standard- als auch maßgeschneiderte Automatisierungslösungen für verschiedenste industrielle Anwendungen – darunter Roboterintegration, Montagesysteme, Zuführlösungen, Verpackung und Steuerungssysteme. Durch die Partnerschaft kann OMRON die Integration von AMR- und stationären Robotersystemen in Mexiko weiter ausbauen. SEI und OMRON arbeiten bereits seit vielen Jahren erfolgreich zusammen und haben zahlreiche Projekte im Bereich industrielle Automatisierung realisiert. Das Team von SEI verfügt über umfassende Erfahrung mit OMRON SCARA-Robotern, mobilen Robotern sowie dem gesamten Automatisierungsportfolio, einschließlich SPS, HMI, Sicherheits- und Servosteuerungen.

### **Über das OMRON Systemintegrator-Programm**

Das OMRON Systemintegrator-Programm verbindet führende Lösungsanbieter mit modernster Technologie, gezielten Schulungen und umfassenden Ressourcen, um innovative und wettbewerbsfähige Automatisierungskonzepte zu realisieren. Angesichts des rasanten Fortschritts in der Automatisierungstechnologie setzen Hersteller und Partner auf offene und sichere Robotiklösungen, die flexible Fertigung ermöglichen und Wettbewerbsvorteile schaffen. Die gebündelte Kompetenz dieser Partnerschaft hilft, aktuelle Herausforderungen zu meistern und gleichzeitig effiziente, voll integrierte Systeme zu entwickeln, die auch zukünftigen Anforderungen gerecht werden.

Systemintegratoren nehmen für OMRON eine Schlüsselrolle ein: Sie entwerfen und implementieren umfassende Automatisierungslösungen und bringen spezifisches Branchen- und Anwendungswissen in die Integration neuester OMRON-Technologien ein – inklusive schlüsselfertiger Gesamtsysteme.

### **Über SEI Automation**

[SEI Automation](https://sei-at.com/) ist ein in Tijuana, Mexiko, ansässiges Unternehmen, das sich auf fortschrittliche Automatisierungslösungen spezialisiert hat. Im Fokus stehen innovative Technologien und Dienstleistungen, die Fertigungs- und Industrieprozesse optimieren. SEI Automation verfolgt das Ziel, Unternehmen mit effizienten Lösungen dabei zu unterstützen, ihre Abläufe zu verbessern und die Produktivität nachhaltig zu steigern.

[![](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/SEI-LOGOTIPO-fondo-transparente.png?w=1024)](https://sei-at.com/)

### **Über OMRON Automation und Robotics**

OMRON Automation und OMRON Robotics zählen weltweit zu den führenden Anbietern von industrieller Automatisierung und Robotik und bieten voll integrierte Lösungen für Hersteller rund um den Globus. Während OMRON Automation auf Sensorik, Steuerungs-, Sicherheits-, Bildverarbeitungs- und Bewegungstechnik spezialisiert ist, konzentriert sich OMRON Robotics auf fortschrittliche Robotiklösungen. Mit einer Innovationsgeschichte seit 1933 und rund 30.000 Mitarbeitern in über 110 Ländern unterstützt OMRON Unternehmen dabei, komplexe Fertigungsaufgaben zu lösen und ihre Produktivität zu steigern. Weitere Informationen zu den Automatisierungslösungen von OMRON finden Sie unter [automation.omron.com](https://automation.omron.com/en/us/).

Entdecken Sie das gesamte Robotik-Portfolio von OMRON auf unserer [Übersichtsseite](https://robotics.omron.com/de/products/).

[Neuigkeiten Landingpage](https://robotics.omron.com/de/news/)

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

# Shaping the next era of manufacturing

Transform your production operations with OMRON Robotics.

[See the difference](https://robotics.omron.com/case-studies/)

### WHY OMRON ROBOTICS  OMRON Robotics solves critical manufacturing challenges with innovative and reliable robots and software—delivering scalable solutions to improve safety, productivity, and efficiency.

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

[Learn more](https://robotics.omron.com/about-us/)

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

[Learn more](https://robotics.omron.com/about-us/)

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

[Learn more](https://robotics.omron.com/about-us/)

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

## OMRON Robotics Solutions
# Shaping the next era of manufacturing

Transform your production operations with OMRON Robotics.

[See the difference](https://robotics.omron.com/case-studies/)

### WHY OMRON ROBOTICS  OMRON Robotics solves critical manufacturing challenges with innovative and reliable robots and software—delivering scalable solutions to improve safety, productivity, and efficiency.

Robots deployed globally—enabling smarter, faster, and safer manufacturing.

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

[Learn more](https://robotics.omron.com/about-us/)

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

[Learn more](https://robotics.omron.com/about-us/)

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

[Learn more](https://robotics.omron.com/about-us/)

#### Next-gen collaborative robots

Leverage flexible cobots for smarter operations, increased productivity, and quicker task execution.


[Find the right cobot](https://robotics.omron.com/products/collaborative-robots/)

[Transform your logistics](https://robotics.omron.com/products/mobile-robots/)

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

[Learn more](https://robotics.omron.com/about-us/)

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

[Learn more](https://robotics.omron.com/about-us/)

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

# Shaping the next era of manufacturing

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

[Learn more](https://robotics.omron.com/about-us/)

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

[Learn more](https://robotics.omron.com/about-us/)

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

[Learn more](https://robotics.omron.com/about-us/)

[Find the right cobot](https://robotics.omron.com/products/collaborative-robots/)

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

[Learn more](https://robotics.omron.com/about-us/)

Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

[Learn more](https://robotics.omron.com/about-us/)

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

# Shaping the next era of manufacturing

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

[Learn more](https://robotics.omron.com/about-us/)

Robots deployed globally—enabling smarter, faster, and safer manufacturing.

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

[Learn more](https://robotics.omron.com/about-us/)

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

[Learn more](https://robotics.omron.com/about-us/)

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

[Learn more](https://robotics.omron.com/about-us/)

### ABOUT US  Redefining the future of human-machine collaboration

OMRON Robotics empowers businesses with advanced technology and tailored solutions to solve complex manufacturing challenges, optimize processes, and work smarter. By automating repetitive tasks and enabling seamless collaboration, our robots’ free teams to focus on critical, creative, and strategic work. Together with our customers, we are shaping a future where humans and robots work side-by-side, advancing industries, driving innovation, and fostering the well-being of our global society.

### BRANCHEN  Individuelle Robotiklösungen für Ihre Branche

Entdecken Sie, warum Hersteller weltweit auf OMRON Robotics setzen, um Produktionsherausforderungen mit maßgeschneiderten Roboterlösungen zu meistern – für mehr Produktivität, weniger Ausfallzeiten und höchste Präzision in jedem Arbeitsschritt.

[Automobilindustrie\\
\\
![Automotive_Industries_optimized_home](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Automotive_Industries_optimized_home-scaled.jpg?w=480)\\
![ticker bg image](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/themes/omron/assets/img/svg/ticker-1.svg)](https://robotics.omron.com/de/industries/automotive/) [Medizin\\
\\

### PRODUKTE  Automatisierte Robotik für effizientere Arbeitsabläufe und höhere Produktivität

#### Optimieren Sie Ihre Produktion

Von Qualität bis Sicherheit – unsere Lösungen automatisieren jeden Schritt Ihres Fertigungsprozesses.


[Produktübersicht](https://robotics.omron.com/de/products/)

![Omron_Robotics_Family_Group_Website](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/07/Omron_Robotics_Family_Group_Website.webp?w=655)

#### Industrieroboter

Maximieren Sie Ihren Output, steigern Sie die Qualität und verkürzen Sie die Zykluszeiten mit unseren Industrierobotern.


[Vorteile entdecken](https://robotics.omron.com/de/products/industrial-robots/)

![Industrial_Robot_Family_Group_Website_Final](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Industrial_Robot_Family_Group_Website_Final-1.png?w=655)

#### Cobots der nächsten Generation

Profitieren Sie von flexiblen kollaborativen Robotern für smarte Prozesse, mehr Produktivität und schnellere Aufgabenbearbeitung.


[Passenden Cobot entdecken](https://robotics.omron.com/de/products/collaborative-robots/)

![Collaborative_Robots_Website_Section_Final](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Collaborative_Robots_Website_Section_Final-1.png?w=655)

#### Smarter Materialtransport

Optimieren Sie Ihre Logistik mit autonomen mobilen Robotern – für automatisierten Materialtransport und maximale Effizienz.


[Logistik optimieren](https://robotics.omron.com/de/products/mobile-robots/)

![Mobile_Robots_Group_Website_ORT_FInal](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Mobile_Robots_Group_Website_ORT_FInal-2.png?w=655)

![moving orb](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/themes/omron/assets/img/webp/orb-green.webp)

![Human_Machine_Collaboration_OMRON](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Human_Machine_Collaboration_OMRON-scaled.jpg?w=546)

### ÜBER UNS  Die Zusammenarbeit zwischen Mensch und Maschine neu definieren.

OMRON Robotics hilft Unternehmen, mit innovativer Technologie und maßgeschneiderten Lösungen komplexe Fertigungsherausforderungen zu meistern und Prozesse effizienter zu gestalten. Unsere Roboter automatisieren wiederkehrende Aufgaben und ermöglichen Teams, sich auf kreative und strategische Aufgaben zu konzentrieren. Gemeinsam schaffen wir eine Zukunft, in der Menschen und Roboter Seite an Seite arbeiten, Fortschritt vorantreiben und das Wohl unserer Gesellschaft stärken.

[Mehr erfahren](https://robotics.omron.com/de/about-us/)

### Robotik-Blog

Mit OMRON Robotics sind Sie immer einen Schritt voraus – entdecken Sie technische Einblicke und innovative Automatisierungslösungen, die Ihre Prozesse verbessern, die Auslastung erhöhen und Ihre Fertigung zukunftssicher machen.

[Alle Beiträge anzeigen](https://robotics.omron.com/de/blog/)

![OL-450S Launch News by OMRON Robotics](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/OL-450S-Launch-News-by-OMRON-Robotics-scaled.jpg?w=655)

[Blog\\
\\
**Lernen Sie den OL-450S kennen – Intelligentes Materialhandling für automatisierte Lager**](https://robotics.omron.com/de/blog/ol-450s-robotics-automation/)

AUTONOMOUS MOBILE ROBOT

# LD-60/90

The LD-60/90 AMRs offer autonomous material transport in manufacturing, warehousing, and labs—providing flexible payload options and optional ESD protection to ensure safe handling of sensitive materials.

[View product brochure](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/LD_Series_Brochure_OMRON_Robotics_EN.pdf)

Book a demo

Book a demo

KEY SPECIFICATIONS

LD-60

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| Maximum payload | 60 kg |
| Maximum speed | 1800 mm/s |
| Run time | 15 h (no payload), 12 h (full payload) |
| Charging time | 2 h 10 m (for 20–80% charge) |
| Maximum slope | 4.8° / 8.3% incline |
| Control interface | [MobilePlanner](https://robotics.omron.com/products/mobile-robots/software/mobileplanner/) |

LD-90

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| Maximum payload | 90 kg |
| Maximum speed | 1350 mm/s |
| Run time | 15 h (no payload), 12 h (full payload) |
| Charging time | 2 h 10 m (for 20–80% charge) |
| Maximum slope | Level floor only |
| Control interface | MobilePlanner |

LD-90x

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| Maximum payload | 90 kg |
| Maximum speed | 900 mm/s |
| Run time | 20 h (no payload), 15 h (full payload) |
| Charging time | 2 h 10 m (for 20–80% charge) |
| Maximum slope | Level floor only |
| Control interface | MobilePlanner |

[View datasheet](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/I828-E-15_Autonomous_Mobile_Robot_LD_Series_RevP.pdf)

### FEATURES  LD-60/90—smarter automation for safer logistics

![Autonomous Navigation (1)](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Autonomous-Navigation-1-1.png?w=56)

01

###### Autonomous navigation

Self-mapping technology allows for navigation without floor magnets or beacons, saving time and reducing setup expenses.

![moving orb](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/themes/omron/assets/img/webp/orb-white.webp)

![Safety Settings](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Safety-Settings.png?w=56)

02

###### Advanced safety features

360° obstacle detection with LiDAR, bumpers, and rear sonar ensures safety in busy and confined environments.

![moving orb](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/themes/omron/assets/img/webp/orb-white.webp)

![Easy Installation](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Easy-Installation.png?w=56)

03

###### Easy installation

Rapidly deploy without facility modifications. Integrate seamlessly with MES, ERP, and WMS systems for fast setup.

![moving orb](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/themes/omron/assets/img/webp/orb-white.webp)

![Certified Compliance](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Certified-Compliance.png?w=56)

04

###### Certified compliance

Certified to global safety, battery, and cleanroom standards: EN ISO 12100, 13849-1, 60204-1, 1525, ANSI B56.5, UN 38.3, UL 2271, ISO 5.

![moving orb](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/themes/omron/assets/img/webp/orb-white.webp)

![Smarter Fleet Mgmt](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Smarter-Fleet-Mgmt.png?w=56)

05

###### Smarter fleet management

Optimizes workflows with real-time updates, intelligent routing, and easy tablet-based interaction via the updated MobilePlanner.

![moving orb](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/themes/omron/assets/img/webp/orb-white.webp)

![Packaging](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Packaging.png?w=56)

06

###### ESD Protection

Optional ESD skins protect sensitive components and the robot itself from static discharge, ideal for electronics manufacturing.

![moving orb](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/themes/omron/assets/img/webp/orb-white.webp)

![background graphic](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Mobile-Technical-Drawing.svg)

![](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/07/FLOW-Core-Software-Insights-Fleet-Management.png)

![background graphic](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/themes/omron/assets/img/webp/image-video-orb.webp)

### SOFTWARE  Optimize your fleet’s performance with FLOW Core

FLOW Core software streamlines job setup, route planning, and real-time monitoring for up to 100 AMRs. Leverage intelligent task assignment, dynamic traffic control, and adaptive navigation to maximize productivity—empowering your fleet to deliver unmatched performance and reliability.

[Learn more](https://robotics.omron.com/products/mobile-robots/software/)

### APPLICATIONS  Tailored solutions for light-duty transport

From parts delivery and work-in-process to finished goods transport, OMRON LD-60/90 AMRs automate material movement across manufacturing, warehousing, and logistics, streamlining workflows and boosting operational efficiency.

[Inbound logistics\\
\\
![Omron LD Mobile Robot_2](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Omron-LD-Mobile-Robot_2-scaled.jpg?w=655)\\

\\

\\

### CASE STUDY  See how Polar Semiconductor leveraged OMRON’s LD series AMRs to cut 40 miles of manual material transport

[Watch the story](https://robotics.omron.com/case-studies/automated-material-handling-polar-semiconductor-omron/) [See all case studies](https://robotics.omron.com/case-studies/)

![Thumb_Polar_Semiconductor_Case_Study_OMRON](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Thumb_Polar_Semiconductor_Case_Study_OMRON.jpg)

### MANIPULATOR SOLUTION  Collaborative production starts with MoMa

Transform your operations with Mobile Manipulator (MoMa) applications. Seamlessly combine collaborative and mobile robotics to automate transport and picking tasks, while improving flexibility, productivity, and workflow precision.

[Learn more about MoMa](https://robotics.omron.com/products/mobile-robots/mobile-manipulator/)

Watch

video

## Automate your applications

Streamline your workflows with Omron’s industrial automation solutions. Seamlessly program and synchronize robots, safety, and vision systems on one platform. Integrated simulation ensures easy deployment and efficient operations.

Visit OMRON Automation

[Visit OMRON Automation](https://cta-na2.hubspot.com/web-interactives/public/v1/track/click?encryptedPayload=AVxigLKC4BCU3FYS5urPIXGUl%2Bt2BSOa6dzNdKY75oy3GOwt5FE%2BbP1s03%2BCZxw4YcAr0aPYC6Ze5XfxZikxWgjUUEzyYpid5wXpcziePmFZ9QLqvOAVutCsBD9bysZbbm5%2BR%2FHqoRUk%2FdEOlfc%2FJQDSSbOWAiU8AEQj%2Bef%2BiRv63Artjn3Mld0z&portalId=47882041)

![Omron_Automation_Drawing](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Omron_Automation_Drawing.png?w=634)

![Automation_Diagram_Motion-LD](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Automation_Diagram_Motion-LD.jpg?w=293)

01

###### Motion

Servos ensure efficient line movement, reducing downtime and maintenance for smoother, more reliable operations.

![Automation_Diagram_Robotics-LD](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Automation_Diagram_Robotics-LD.jpg?w=293)

02

###### Robotics

Industrial, mobile, and collaborative robots enhance productivity and easily adapt to a wide range of applications with precision.

![Automation_Diagram_Control-i4H](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Automation_Diagram_Control-i4H.jpg?w=293)

03

###### Control

Control units integrate your production line, maximizing productivity while saving space with built-in systems.

![Automation_Diagram_Vision](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Automation_Diagram_Vision.jpg?w=293)

04

###### Vision

Cameras and sensors adapt to your environment, enabling smooth, accurate, and high-quality automated processes.

![Automation_Diagram_Safety](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Automation_Diagram_Safety.jpg?w=293)

05

###### Safety

Safety sensors ensure seamless human-machine collaboration, reducing risks and enhancing workplace safety.

## Autonomous Mobile Robots
# Autonomous Mobile Robots

Maximize your efficiency with our Autonomous Mobile Robots—automating operations for smarter workflows and greater productivity.

![OMRON_LD_AMR](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/OMRON_LD_AMR-1-scaled.jpg?w=312)

01

##### LD Series

The LD series moves materials efficiently in high-traffic areas without facility modifications. With intelligent navigation around people and obstacles, it supports payloads of 60, 90, and 250 kg—ensuring safety and productivity.

[Explore LD Series](https://robotics.omron.com/products/mobile-robots/ld-series/)

![Multiple OL-450S (1)](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Multiple-OL-450S-1.png?w=312)

02

##### OL Series

The OL-450S is a low-profile, omni-directional AMR that streamlines material handling with a 450 kg payload. Featuring precise obstacle avoidance, a built-in lifting plate, and wireless charging, it enhances workflow efficiency and safety in logistics.

[Explore OL Series](https://robotics.omron.com/products/mobile-robots/ol-series/ol-450s/)

![MD-650 pallet-transfer](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/07/MD-650-pallet-transfer.jpg?w=250)

03

##### MD Series

The MD series AMRs, available in 650 kg and 900 kg max payloads, optimizes material transport using 360° sensing and dynamic obstacle avoidance. They feature automatic charging and seamless production integration for enhanced productivity.

[Explore MD Series](https://robotics.omron.com/products/mobile-robots/md-series/md-650-900/)

![HD1500 Beauty Shot Front 2](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/HD1500-Beauty-Shot-Front-2-e1753990845652.png?w=312)

04

##### HD Series

The HD-1500 AMR handles a 1500 kg payload for heavy transport tasks. It features dynamic 360° safety, obstacle avoidance, and allows for customization with accessories like HAPS and LiDAR to enhance operational capabilities.

[Explore HD Series](https://robotics.omron.com/products/mobile-robots/hd-series/hd-1500/)

![OMRON_LD_AMR](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/OMRON_LD_AMR-1-scaled.jpg?w=1024)

![Multiple OL-450S (1)](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/Multiple-OL-450S-1.png?w=656)

![MD-650 pallet-transfer](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/07/MD-650-pallet-transfer.jpg?w=768)

![HD1500 Beauty Shot Front 2](https://robotics.omron.com/wp-content/uploads/HD1500-Beauty-Shot-Front-2-e1753990845652.png?w=1024)
